pageTitle: Amla-Kallis combo works wonders for SA - Cricbuzz
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {44970=Copyright © 2015 Cricbuzz.com, Times Internet Limited . All rights reserved | The Times of India | Navbharath Times}
textBeforeTable: Most runs in partnership for South Africa: Amla and Kallis have been involved in 11 century stands for South Africa which puts them second on the list of most century stands for South Africa, behind the pair of AB de Villiers and Kallis. Hashim Amla and Jacques Kallis not only put South Africa in a good position in the opening Test against Australia with their third wicket stand, but also surpassed the pair of Gary Kirsten and Kallis himself to go atop the list for most runs in partnership for a South African pair in Test cricket. Amla, who became the seventh South African to score in excess of 5000 runs, put on a stand worth 165 runs with Kallis which took their partnership aggregate to 3636 runs, 44 more than Kirsten and Kallis. Hashim Amla and Jacques Kallis now have the most runs in partnership for a South African pair. © Cricbuzz
textAfterTable: Amla and Kallis occupy the third spot in the list of best third wicket partnership aggregates in Test cricket. The Indian pair of Rahul Dravid & Sachin Tendulkar occupy the top spot while the Lankan duo of Mahela Jayawardene & Kumar Sangakkara rank second.
